媕字的基本解释

媕
ān
〔媕娿（
?）〕a.依违从人，敷衍逢迎，如“中朝大官老于事，讵肯感激徒媕媕。”b.犹豫不决。

媕字的汉语字典释义
暂无汉字(媕)的汉语大字典的解释
媕字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　媕； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页266第44
【廣韻】【集韻】?衣檢切，音揜。【說文】女有心媕媕也。　又【集韻】於琰切，音黶。義同。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?烏含切，音諳。媕娿，不決也。　又【集韻】遏合切，音姶。女名。

媕字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
媕字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
undecided
ān
〔媕娿(
?)] a. Follow people, perfunctorily greet them, such as "Chinese and Korean officials are always in trouble, but I am grateful to them." b. Hesitate.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　媕; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 266 44
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Clothing inspection and cutting, sound masking. 【Said the text】Women have a heart and a girl.　[Jiyun] Yu Yanqie, sound. The same meaning.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Wu Hanqie, the sound is familiar. Whispering, indecision also.　[Jiyun] Contains and cuts, sound. Female name.
